verbs.description: [ARG0: Stormy Daniels 's initial attorney in the hush - money ordeal with Trump and his longtime lawyer Michael Cohen] [V: filed] [ARG1: a defamation claim] [ARG3: against her and her current counsel , Michael Avenatti ,] [ARGM-ADV: in addition to a separate claim against Cohen] [ARG3: for allegedly illegally recording their phone calls] .

Stormy Daniels 's initial attorney in the hush - money ordeal with Trump and his longtime lawyer Michael Cohen filed a defamation claim against her and her current counsel , Michael Avenatti , in addition to a separate claim against [ARG0: Cohen] for [ARGM-ADV: allegedly] [ARGM-MNR: illegally] [V: recording] [ARG1: their phone calls] .
